title: Lakers aren't that far off; Finally Virginia's Final Four year; College Hoop Picks; Gottlieb's backward shorts game
itunes:title: Lakers aren't that far off; Finally Virginia's Final Four year; College Hoop Picks; Gottlieb's backward shorts game
description:
Subscribe here to the All Ball with Doug Gottlieb Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/all-ball-with-doug-gottlieb/id1358843497?mt=2.  This week, Gottlieb explains why the Lakers aren't as far off from contending as people think, what they need to add to the roster, why this is finally Virginia's Final Four year, gives his Saturday college picks, and tells the story about his backwards shorts game, in honor of Michael Beasley. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
